name: Lucky's Restaurant
text:
Lucky's RESTAURANT Thai, Chinese & Vietnamese LICENSED CASUAL DINING TAKE-OUT - FAST DELIVERY 623-5780

180 Cumberland St. N. corner River & Cumberland Thunder Bay, ON P7A 4M8

Restaurant Hours Mondays - Fridays: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm Weekends & Holidays: 3:00 pm - 8:00 pm (Closed occasional holidays for staff family time; please call first)

Operated by 2610657 Ontario Inc. Find us on facebook by Meta Visit: www.luckystbay.ca

13% HST extra on all menu items. Prices subject to change without notice.
